metadata.description: The wedding of the century is nearly here! Take an in-depth look behind the curtain at the Prince and his soon to be bride. Kate Middleton and Prince William of Wales, the heir presumptive to the British throne, have become global celebrities, and this issue will show you who these people are, giving you a closer look than those photos can ever show you. Available in a comic book edition and a graphic novel edition with additional pages and artwork on the royal couple.
metadata.name: The Royals
